description:
Join Contrast Security to explore the differences between dynamic application security testing (DAST), static application security testing (SAST) and learn how interactive application security testing (IAST) is innovating the Application Security market - producing better results in a faster time frame, helping developers meet their primary objective and most importantly creating software solutions that are secure!

SPEAKER:
Roman Yankin
Senior Sales Engineer, Contrast Security

Roman has vast experience in the Application Security domain across multiple sub-segments, encompassing, IAST, SAST and Open Source analysis (SCA).

Throughout his career Roman has advised companies across multiple sectors to address their AppSec needs - enabling them to validate their decision making criteria against industry standards.

Prior to his career as a Sales engineer, Roman was a Java Developer which enables him to understand the Dev and DevOps needs from first hand experience of navigating through a multitude of tech stacks, methodologies and architectures.
title: Summer Series: SAST, DAST, AND IAST: Why the difference matters
